name: dough
content:
dough noun
(FLOUR)
Add to word list
Add to word list
[ C or U ] flour mixed with water and often yeast, fat, or sugar, so that it is ready for baking: bread dough pastry dough She kneaded the dough and left it to rise.
Manuel Sulzer/Cultura/GettyImages
